Text:
THIS is the one! Wow! 
Absolutely FLAWLESS video quality. Beautiful sound. THIS is what we've been waiting for!

I played it on my Mac using DivX Plus Player (a free program) and even connected it to my big screen HDTV and it looked GREAT!

Also, no ads or super-imposed unnecessaries as I've seen on some other videos.

I wish more Torrents were like this!
